name: Geometric Pairings, Mo. 15
description: This yearÂ´s time quality seems somewhat fluid - it is difficult to distinguish between yesterday, today and tomorrow, while it feels like time is racing ahead and not passing at all at the same time. The images from this series reflect this quality. They are details of buildings of different architectural styles/ages, all reminiscing geometric abstractions by Piet Mondrian, Josef Albers, El Lissitzky and the like. I captured these images this year in Berlin.
